qas.question: Under whose direction was there disappointment?
After Gaspart, who was manager of team Barcelona?
At this time, what type of players were added to Barcelona?
What season did Barcelona win La Liga and Supercopa de Espana?
Which player won FIFA World Player of the Year?

context: After the disappointment of the <a0_0>Gaspart<a0_0/> era, the combination of a new young president, Joan Laporta, and a young new manager, former Dutch and Milan star <a1_0>Frank Rijkaard<a1_0/>, saw the club bounce back. On the field, an influx of <a2_0>international<a2_0/> players, including Ronaldinho, Deco, Henrik Larsson, Ludovic Giuly, Samuel Eto'o, and Rafael Márquez, combined with home grown Spanish players, such as Carles Puyol, Andrés Iniesta, Xavi and Víctor Valdés, led to the club's return to success. Barcelona won La Liga and the Supercopa de España in <a3_0>2004–05<a3_0/>, and <a4_0>Ronaldinho<a4_0/> and Eto'o were voted first and third, respectively, in the FIFA World Player of the Year awards.
